amendment.description: At end of bill add: SEC. __. None of the funds in this Act may be used to implement section___ of this bill (relating to oil-shale leasing) in the States of Utah or Wyoming.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds in the bill relating to oil-shale leasing in the States of Utah or Wyoming.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cannon amendment (A058) Failed by recorded vote: 204 - 223 (Roll no. 576).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A058) offered by Mr. Cannon.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Cannon amendment (A058) Failed by recorded vote: 204 - 223 (Roll no. 576).
